entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount with a value of 100,000,000 using the axis InvestmentTypeAxis in the role 9954509 - Disclosure - Commitments And Contingencies (Details) on the table bxp:CommitmentsAndContingenciesDisclosureTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount was the member us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember. The member us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount with a value of 100,000,000 without the InvestmentTypeAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount fact are: Period :2023-10-02 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=bxp:MetropolitanSquareMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:10083 Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20240630.htm 8

[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentage with a value of 0.12 using the axis InvestmentTypeAxis in the role 9954509 - Disclosure - Commitments And Contingencies (Details) on the table bxp:CommitmentsAndContingenciesDisclosureTable. The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentage fact are: Period :2023-10-02 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=bxp:MetropolitanSquareMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10083 Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20240630.htm 8

[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess with a value of 20,000,000 using the axis InvestmentTypeAxis in the role 9954509 - Disclosure - Commitments And Contingencies (Details) on the table bxp:CommitmentsAndContingenciesDisclosureTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess was the member us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember. The member us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess with a value of 20,000,000 without the InvestmentTypeAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess fact are: Period :2023-10-02 Dimensions : srt:StatementScenarioAxis=us-gaap:ScenarioPlanMember, us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=bxp:MetropolitanSquareMember, us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=srt:AffiliatedEntityMember Unit : USD
